query:
INSERT INTO `campaignPhaseTemplates` (`campaignType`, `phaseNumber`, `phaseName`, `narrative`, `successBonus`, `failureConsequence`) VALUES
('armageddon', 1, 'Stabilising the Front', 'Stabilising the front lines on Armageddon against the overwhelming Horde will provide a stable foundation for defenders. At the end of each battle, if you are the victor, gain five strategic points.', 'RESURGENT MORALE: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Reclaim the Lost Hives narrative goal, and each time you purchase the Increase Supply Limit requisition, increase your Crusade force''s supply limit by 250 points, instead of 200.', 'GRIM DETERMINATION: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Strengthen the Imperator Line narrative goal, and in each battle, the first time a unit from your Crusade army falls a Battle-shock test, that unit instead passes that test.'),
('armageddon', 2, 'Reclaim the Lost Hives', 'Building on early success, the Gatebreakers of Armageddon strive to seize and cleanse the fallen hives of Hades and Thoriddas. At the end of each battle, if two or more units from your Crusade army (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) are wholly within your opponent''s deployment zone, gain five strategic points.', 'COMMANDING GRASP: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Raze the Monoliths narrative goal, and in each battle, in your second Command step, you can select one unit from your Crusade army in Strategic Reserve. Set up that unit on the battlefield as if it were the third battle round.', 'STAGED WITHDRAWAL: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Light in the Dark narrative goal, and in each battle, at the start of the Declare Battle Formations step, you can select one BATTLELINE unit from your Crusade army. All models in that unit have the Scouts 6" ability until the end of the battle.'),
('armageddon', 3, 'Strengthen the Imperator Line', 'Having suffered a series of defeats, the Gatebreakers must reinforce their defences before they can resume their offensive. At the end of each battle, if no enemy units (excluding AIRCRAFT and Battle-shocked units) are wholly within your opponent''s deployment zone, gain five strategic points.', 'IMPENETRABLE WALL: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Raze the Monoliths narrative goal, and in each battle, each time a unit from your Crusade army is selected to be Marked for Greatness, it gains an additional 1 XP.', 'DEFENSIVE SWEEP: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Light in the Dark narrative goal, and in each battle, enemy units cannot be set up within your deployment zone (except when disembarking).'),
('armageddon', 4, 'Raze the Monoliths', 'With momentum behind them, the defenders of Armageddon make a bold strike to destroy the monoliths anchoring the Red Angel''s Gate in reality. At the end of each battle, if you control one or more objective markers in your opponent''s deployment zone, gain five strategic points.', 'RIGHTEOUS RESOLVE: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Shatter the Red Angel''s Gate narrative goal, and in each battle, each time an enemy model makes an attack that targets a unit from your Crusade army with one or more Warp counters, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.', 'DESPERATION: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Shatter the Red Angel''s Gate narrative goal, and in each battle, at the start of your Command phase, you can select one unit from your Crusade army. Add or remove one Warp counter to/from that unit.'),
('armageddon', 5, 'Light in the Dark', 'As the planet descends into chaos, the Gatebreakers forces become beacons of hatred and defiance, steadfast in the face of the darkness. At the end of each battle, if the points value of destroyed units from your opponent''s Crusade army is higher than that of destroyed units from your Crusade army, gain five strategic points.', 'FAITH REKINDLED: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Shatter the Red Angel''s Gate narrative goal, and in each battle, each time a model from your Crusade army makes an attack that targets a unit with one or more Warp counters, re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.', 'FORLORN HOPE: In the next campaign phase, attempt the Shatter the Red Angel''s Gate narrative goal, and in each battle, once per turn, you can re-roll one Hit roll made for a unit from your Crusade army.'),
('armageddon', 6, 'Shatter the Red Angel''s Gate', 'The Gatebreakers throw everything into a final assault upon the Red Angel''s Gate. Only by sealing the portal can Armageddon''s invasion of Armageddon be foiled. At the end of each battle, gain a number of Campaign points (CP) equal to your alliance''s campaign points (CP) gained in this way as an exemplary battle.', 'Campaign Victory: The defenders successfully close the Red Angel''s Gate, saving Armageddon from total destruction.', 'Campaign Defeat: The Red Angel''s Gate remains open, and the planet falls to the forces of Chaos.')
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user y1cGfLdmebRhpZp.root --database gRS8T4icPQs9vemeq36gRn --execute INSERT INTO `campaignPhaseTemplates` (`campaignType`, `phaseNumber`, `phaseName`, `narrative`, `successBonus`, `failureConsequence`) VALUES

All models in that unit have the Scouts 6" ability until the end of the battle.'),

('armageddon', 6, 'Shatter the Red Angel''s Gate', 'The Gatebreakers throw everything into a final assault upon the Red Angel''s Gate.
